com.cloudera.oryx.computation.common.records

Interface Record

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroRecord, CSVRecord, SimpleRecord, VectorRecord

    public interface Record
    Represents a "flat" (i.e., no nested records or collection types) collection of named and typed fields.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Record copy(boolean deep)
      Creates a copy of this Record instance, either a shallow copy that has the same Spec but not the same data, or a deep copy that contains copies of all of the data stored in the fields of this instance.
      Object get(int index)
      A generic getter for when the client is indifferent to the return type of the field.
      double getAsDouble(int index)
      Returns the value of the field at the given index coerced to be a double.
      String getAsString(int index)
      Returns the value of the field at the given index coerced to a string via the toString method on the object.
      Boolean getBoolean(int index)
      Convenience method for getting the Boolean value at the given index.
      Boolean getBoolean(String fieldName)
      Convenience method for getting the Boolean value of a named field.
      Double getDouble(int index)
      Convenience method for getting the Double value at the given index.
      Double getDouble(String fieldName)
      Convenience method for getting the Double value of a named field.
      Integer getInteger(int index)
      Convenience method for getting the Integer value at the given index.
      Integer getInteger(String fieldName)
      Convenience method for getting the Integer value of a named field.
      Long getLong(int index)
      Convenience method for getting the Long value at the given index.
      Long getLong(String fieldName)
      Convenience method for getting the Long value of a named field.
      Spec getSpec()
      Returns the RecordSpec for this Record instance, which describes the names and types of its fields.
      String getString(int index)
      Convenience method for getting the String value at the given index.
      String getString(String fieldName)
      Convenience method for getting the String value of a named field.
      Record set(int index, Object value)
      Sets the value at the given index in this Record instance.
      Record set(String fieldName, Object value)
      Sets the value at the given name in this Record instance.
      int size()
      Returns the number of fields in this record.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpec

        Spec getSpec()
        Returns the RecordSpec for this Record instance, which describes the names and types of its fields.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of fields in this record.

      • copy

        Record copy(boolean deep)
            throws IOException
        Creates a copy of this Record instance, either a shallow copy that has the same Spec but not the same data, or a deep copy that contains copies of all of the data stored in the fields of this instance.
        Parameters:
        deep - Whether or not to perform a deep copy of the fields of this instance
        Returns:
        A new Record with the same Spec as this instance
        Throws:
        IOException

      • get

        Object get(int index)
        A generic getter for when the client is indifferent to the return type of the field. The object returned is guaranteed to be of the type specified by the FieldSpec for the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the field to return
        Returns:
        An object, or some sort of unpleasant exception if the index is out of bounds

      • getAsString

        String getAsString(int index)
        Returns the value of the field at the given index coerced to a string via the toString method on the object.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the field to return

      • getAsDouble

        double getAsDouble(int index)
        Returns the value of the field at the given index coerced to be a double. If the coercion is not successful, Double.NaN is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the field to return

      • getBoolean

        Boolean getBoolean(int index)
                   throws IOException
        Convenience method for getting the Boolean value at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the field to return
        Returns:
        A Boolean representation of the value at the given index
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getBoolean

        Boolean getBoolean(String fieldName)
                   throws IOException
        Convenience method for getting the Boolean value of a named field.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the field to return
        Returns:
        A Boolean representation of the value for the field
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getDouble

        Double getDouble(int index)
                 throws IOException
        Convenience method for getting the Double value at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the field to return
        Returns:
        A Double representation of the value at the given index
        Throws:
        IOException

        Record set(int index,
         Object value)
        Sets the value at the given index in this Record instance.
        Parameters:

        value - The value to set the field to
        Returns:
        This Record instance, for method chaining
